property.name: DefenderBriefing
property.value:
An enemy commander is attempting FACTORY RAID on a planet you are defending! Their goal is to break through the factory's defensive perimeter and steal a cache of critical military components.

To help in your defense of the factory, you are being provided with a significant number of conventional mines. These mines will be invisible to the attacker until triggered, but visible to you. Lay these mines in areas where you expect the enemy to move through (do NOT place more than one 5-point field in a single hex).

Be advised, the enemy force has brought a small (off-board) artillery unit which they will try to use to keep you off-balance. It will take 2-3 rounds for artillery to arrive on battlefield each time that it is fired, so stay on the move and make it difficult for the enemy to decide where to direct their attacks.

Fight hard commander. If you can stop the enemy, it will be a big morale boost for our side (and there will be substantial rewards for you as well). Good luck!

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Opposing Sides: Deployment will always be opposite of opponent (0% chance of center/edge)
* Attacker Artillery: 1 artillery unit (type depends on BV), deployed off-board
* Defender Mines: one 5-point cluster per 800 BV of the BV total for BOTH armies

VICTORY CONDITIONS (Stand-Up Fight):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 50% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 125% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (None): No land exchange in this operation
* Extra Comps Production: 2000 BV: ~5,000 / 4000 BV: ~10,000 / 6000 BV: ~15,000 (if victor)
* Intelligence (Standard Defender): +1 Intel (if victor)
* Influence (HIGH): 2000 BV: ~60 flu / 4000 BV: ~100 flu / 6000 BV: ~140 flu (100% if victor, 67% if defeated)
* Operation Pay (HIGH): 2000 BV: ~4,352 CBills / 4000 BV: ~7,552 CBills / 6000 BV: ~10,752 CBills
* Loss Penalty: -40% pay if defeated -- command will be displeased if the factory is looted
* Dishonorable Surrender: additional -15% pay if you surrender before a 20% BV loss
* Salvage (Favors Defender): 60% friendly/30% enemy-- you control the planet and have salvaging advantage

SPECIAL RULE REMINDERS:
* DO NOT place more than one 5-point mine cluster of hidden mines in a single hex. Doing so is a violation of server rules.

***END BRIEFING***

property.name: AttackerBriefing
property.value:
You have launched a FACTORY RAID on an enemy planet in an attempt to steal a large supply of critical military components. In order to obtain these components, you must first break through a defensive perimeter protected by enemy armored units and minefields.

To assist in the raid, a light artillery team has been dropped (off-board) some distance from battlefield. Use this artillery to deny your opponent cover and to keep them moving around. Be aware that it will take 2-3 rounds for this artillery to arrive on battlefield each time it is fired, so try to anticipate where your opponent will move and fire there in advance.

As noted above, the defender will be placing a number of hidden minefields on the map, which will not be revealed until they are triggered. Be alert to the enemy's attempts to lure you through these minefields.

Once the perimeter defenders are cleared, a recovery team will move in to collect the components. A successful raid could be a big boost for our war effort. Good luck, Commander!

OPERATION FEATURES:
* Opposing Sides: Deployment will always be opposite of opponent (0% chance of center/edge)
* Attacker Artillery: 1 artillery unit (type depends on BV), deployed off-board
* Defender Mines: one 5-point cluster per 800 BV of the BV total for BOTH armies

VICTORY CONDITIONS (Stand-Up Fight):
* Force opponent to surrender OR trigger auto-victory
* Auto-victory triggered when 1) 50% of enemy BV destroyed, and 2) friendly BV is 125% of enemy BV

BATTLE OUTCOMES:
* Land Exchange (None): No land exchange in this operation
* Components Stollen: 2000 BV: ~10,000 / 4000 BV: ~20,000 / 6000 BV: ~30,000 (if winner)
* Components Destroyed: 2000 BV: ~8,000 / 4000 BV: ~16,000 / 6000 BV: ~24,000 (if winner)
* Intelligence (None): No Intel for attacker
* Influence (HIGH): 2000 BV: ~90 flu / 4000 BV: ~120 flu / 6000 BV: ~130 flu (if winner)
* Operation Pay (MEDIUM): 2000 BV: ~3,627 CBills / 4000 BV: ~6,293 CBills / 6000 BV: ~8,960 CBills
* Loss Penalty: -40% pay if defeated -- costly extraction from enemy territory
* Dishonorable Surrender: additional -15% pay if you surrender before a 20% BV loss
* Salvage (Favors Defender): 30% friendly/60% enemy -- enemy controls planet and has salvaging advantage

SPECIAL RULE REMINDERS:
* The defender SHOULD NOT place more than one 5-point mine cluster of hidden mines in a single hex. Doing so is a violation of server rules.

***END BRIEFING***
